translations: v．报答，回报：对某人的好意、恩惠或恶行作出回应。

sentences.sentence: Only one kind of love calls paying never requiting.
sentences.translation: 有一种爱叫付出，不求回报。

sentences.sentence: Commemorates those who we never requiting deep love.
sentences.translation: 纪念那些我们不求回报的深爱。

sentences.sentence: Curious now how the good Lord so and so is requiting me for my benevolence.
sentences.translation: 我现在纳闷的是，这位好心的某某神将如何报答我的善举。
